revised_title: Observations on Natural History and Geological Wonders in Derbyshire
tldr: The author, J. Martyn, shares his observations and findings during a journey to the Peak in Derbyshire, discussing various plants, geological formations, and natural wonders, including Mam-tor, Elden-hole, the ebbing and flowing well, Buxton-Well, Peak's Hole, and Pool's Hole.
